name: Early Bird Coffee Company
description:
Welcome to our web site, and we hope you enjoy the original acrylic paintings on solid wood plank panels.
This is a made to order art piece, if you want to make any changes or personlize this piece now would be the time. Just convo us with your ideas and we'll get back to with the finalized details.
We take pride in choosing boards that have beautiful unique natural qualities.
All of our calligraphy is hand done, and not press on lettering.
Our art work is ready to hang and signed and dated by the artist Gigi.
We welcome commission work, and can accommodate most sizes and shape, including out door signs, please contact us for more information about custom work. ( 2-4 week delivery on custom work ).
Hope you enjoy our shop, please stop by often as we are always adding new items,
John and Gigi
This piece is: 24” X 32” X 1/2"

Our calligraphy is hand painted (not press on letters ), and every piece is signed and dated by the artist Gigi and ready to hang.
This sign is a great compliment to any kitchen or family room or garden room or bathroom.
We welcome commission work and specialize in custom signs ( indoor and outdoor ) , just convo us with details and we’ll get the ball rolling, please allow 2-3 weeks delivery.
This piece is: 7” X 7” X 1”

Thanks for stopping by,
John and Gigi

Since we are a vertical operation, we can make any style, shape, indoor or outdoor sign you want. All lettering is hand painted, ( not press on letters) .
We will also design it for you if you don't have a design already.
Our out door signs are painted and coated with exterior products.
